alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:26AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lancaster, southern Seward and Saline Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 625 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cordova, or 17 miles southeast of York, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Friend around 630 AM CDT. Dorchester around 640 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 366 and 377. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
